website_summaries.verdict: Eyeshadow palette by YouTube beauty guru Jeffree Star that offers a bright color story and plenty of shimmer for bold or special occasion eye looks.
pros: Palette features 30 different eye-popping shades and matte, shimmer, and glitter finishes
Includes bright pinks, purples, and greens along with a good range of everyday neutrals
Easy to blend, and most shades are nicely pigmented
cons: Shimmers aren't as pigmented and have a lot of fallout

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Jeffree is above and far beyond anyone else when it comes to makeup. This pallet is amazing and can be used everyday add well as to make a statement, very versatile. And that pigment!!! LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Highly pigmented
customer_reviews.text: Love! Highly pigmented eye shadow. This pallete is a bit loud for my taste but has several nude/tan/brown colors that can be used for everyday look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for Jeffree Star
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was begging for this for Christmas, and although it was much cheaper locally at Ulta, they were all sold out and this was the only place I could find one on short notice. Jeffrey Starr is very nice make up and although this was a little pricey and again cost a lot more than I found it locally, The make up is good quality and I’m very glad that I got it. There is actually a good amount of product and each color and the colors are very vibrant and pigmented and bright! I really recommend although it is a little pricey!
customer_reviews.author: Dani C.

customer_reviews.title: So excited to finally have this palette!
customer_reviews.text: I finally caved and purchased this palette. I've heard so much about it. I have a dupe palette of this one called Fruit Pie Filling. I'm excited to play around with this palette and create different looks with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Begley

customer_reviews.title: You’ll look like a Star, Baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color selection and obviously the quality of the product is phenomenal... The only thing is, it’s more of a stay-at-home palatte because it doesn’t fit in my travel makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: B.A. Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Such a  big  fan  of  Jeffree Star cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: Highly pigmented I love Jeffree's make-up. Such a wonderful high quality products I highly recommend it .❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Get it and thank me later!
customer_reviews.text: excellent pallette! Extremely pigmented and I use it almost every day! Fun to play with all of the colors! I highly recommend this pallette!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Laypath

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a great gift but received it banged up and damaged a little.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Thus is his CHEAPEST pallette I hate it. His others are so much better
customer_reviews.author: Catherine, Impress of Z Internet

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend seller u won't regret buying this makeup pallet
customer_reviews.text: Omg very pretty love the all shades 100/100 definitely planning on buying more makeup like this 💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖
customer_reviews.author: Ben Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Its finally here
customer_reviews.text: The package was not closed.. The product was sliding out the side. I found the product. on the ground near my mailbox. The colors look unique an beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Ann Scott

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Im barely learning how to do makeup but this product is something super pigmented and easy to blend the colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product great colors love it well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with the product...wish I can give seven star and you don't need to do touch up in a day 😊
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: It can have the tiniest bit of fallout, but it’s barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great palette, very pigmented. Lots of everyday cute colors, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Gave as a gift and they love it....
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Morales

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for one of my best friends and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and the real deal. Beyond happy with this palette
customer_reviews.author: Eddie T

customer_reviews.title: Jsc always delivers!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was great but I was told I paid way too much for it so that’s on me though. I love all Jeffree Starr products though
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for any JSC lover
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Jeffree Star palette, so already perfection, but it was packaged well, no damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Franck

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors and the quality. It gets dirty fast
customer_reviews.author: Lucmar Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: This shouldn’t be sold on amazon. It’s a Jeffree product and he doesn’t sell on here.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: lifestyle! Selection of shades for teenage diva.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was searching for as a gift for teenage grand. Perfect for her and her active lifedtyle!
customer_reviews.author: Hunting lady

customer_reviews.title: THE REAL DEAL!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT WONDERFUL CANT WAIT TO USE IT. ITS THE REAL THING!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Molina

customer_reviews.title: sucks
customer_reviews.text: OMG can't believe this guy is rich selling this...its not worth it and makeup is meant for girls come on people
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: If you bought this pallet or are considering buying this pallet be extremely careful. The colors are beautiful but there is sooo much fall out. Also the shade millions, will stick to your face and get everywhere. I literally spent 15 minutes with makeup wipes trying to get it off. Instead of getting it off, it just moved it around all over my face and body. I have glitter on me for 2 days. I’m really really disappointed because I love the colors and this was my second “name brand” pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Hard to work with
customer_reviews.text: I got this palette for 14 dlls on Morphe, the shades are very beautiful but it was not what i expected. There is a ton of fallout. I dealt with fallout before which I dont mind but this palette is just too much. The shades dont blend well and can be difficult to work with. I was very sad about it. I do love the brushes. I gave the palette to my daughter but I dont think I will buy Morphe again. Like BH and colourpop so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ivi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this... even IF it’s authentic you can get it off morphe, beauty bay, Beautylish or even his site for 18 rn
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela arguello

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: You can buy the REAL product at ULTA and its cheaper at ULTA. Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.author: Erin Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from amazon buy from manufacturer-
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and the black eyeshadow was cracked and crumbled which leads me to believe that the packaging and handling was not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: RBGD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My grand daughter is going to love this. Nice packaging. The mirror in it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie F. Swimline

product_meta.title: Morphe x Jeffree Star Artistry Palette - 30 Attention-Grabbing Eyeshadows - A Palette of Matte, Metallic, and Shimmer shades
feature_bullets: 30 SHADES THAT KEEP IT 100: This bright, fully fierce palette know a thing or two about dominating a room with larger-than-life looks with colors like Welcome / shimmering crystal, Back / matte blush, To / shimmering pink pearl, My / matte cotton candy, Channel / matte poppy, and 25 more.

BLEND THE RULES: We aren't your average beauty brand and that's the way we like it. Why fit in when you were born to stand out? Show the world your true, vivid, exploding colors. You do you. And no one else.

WE GOT YOU, MORPHE BABE: Morphe offers a complete lineup of affordable makeup and artistry tools that includes brushes, eyeshadow palettes, foundation, concealer, lipsticks, highlighters, plus must-have influencer collabs with James Charles, Jeffree Star, Jaclyn Hill, and many more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061.
